page.title: 04DAILY LIFE
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF AN ORDINARY CHILD The ordinary child rises at 7.30. They would have a part wash,washing face,neck and perhaps arms and legs. The average breakfast consists of cereal,toast and coffee.He or she would come to school by car.In the middle of the day the child could have school dinners or pack lunch.At 3.05 the child will come home and read or play outside until tea.Tea is a cooked meal consisting of vegetables,some kind of meat and salard.After tea the child would amuse themselves by watching television or playing outside again until 9.30 which is bedtime.The child would read for a while until the child is relaxed and can get to sleep or until the child would be told to put the light out.
